snippet.title: PERFECT MATTER: Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Perfect Matter is an exhilarating classic feeling twin stick shooter with modern flare, where you amass insanely powerful upgrades as you dominate the crumbling foundations of the dying universe.

Perfect Matter is still in development, but plans to release it to Steam in 2020 are in place.

Created By: Wrought Interactive; Christian Maund 
Music: Sunlight Defect
Additional Sound Design: James Helliwell
Additional Sound Design: Hybrid-V
